text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS @CDCgov @WHO Do you actually support this?! 15 days?! Are you, the actual scientists, going to let the #CovidIdiotInChief set a timeline that as of now, has absolutely no science to back it up?! What about your DUTY to protect the public?! #WeNeedALeader #ProtectPeople #COVID19

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
